title: Nikkolina
creator_credit: Glen Salzman, Rebecca Yates, Cineflics and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Deals with the conflict of one’s own personal goals and one’s family by presenting a story about an American-born girl in a Greek immigrant family, and her resolution of the conflict between a skating event and a family wedding.
creator_credit_for_label: Glen Salzman, Rebecca Yates, Cineflics and Learning Corporation of America
